name: beautiful-backgrounds
author: Niekes (https://niekes.com)
description: A collection of customizable web components for creating dynamic, animated backgrounds, featuring a variety of effects including a star field.

scripts.clean: rm -rf dist/components dist/utils/ && rm -f dist/index.js dist/index.d.ts
scripts.release: npm run clean && npm run build && git push --follow-tags && npm publish
